description: Timestamp of the request to write this CSV line, according to the participant's computer
The width of the advisor's marker
Amount of confidence added to the advisor's calculated confidence before capping
The amount the advisor's confidence can vary on a trial-by-trial basis
The group to which the advisor belongs
Pipe-separated list of advisor descriptions encompassed in the hybrid
Pipe-separated list of advisor ids encompassed in the hybrid
ID of the advisor
Description of the advisor's advice style. Can be considered the advisor's name
Whether and how to show the advisor's image alongside their introText. NA=no image; "speech"=image with text in speech bubble
Text with which the advisor is introduced to the participant
Name displayed to the participant
8-character alphanumeric hash uniquely identifying a participant within an experiment
md5 hash generated from participant's ProlificID and study info allowing one-way verification that a given ProlificID was responsible for the data
Position of the advisor in the experimental advisor list
Unused
Whether the advisor belongs to the same group as the participant
Study title
Major.minor.revision version number
The img element src field containing base64-encoded svg file for the advisor portrait
